txt.en: The Orc chieftain guards the entrance to an ancient hall
'I do not believe these Dead are simply passing through my Vale. More seems to be at play here and why do the Orcs and dead share this cave? Quickly, let us return to Ethring with this grim news.'
Instance: Under the White Mountain
Escape the Dead and return to where you entered the cave
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
'To Ethring!'
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
dnt
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
'Let us push these Orcs back into the depths of the mountain. We will strike fear into them and they shall never again return to the surface!'
Speak with Arvaethor
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
The Orc chieftain guards the entrance to an ancient hall
A foreboding chill permeates the air of the cave
Arvaethor must survive
Defeat Orcs under the mountain ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
Quickly, escape with your life!
You and Arvaethor enter the cave.\n\nYou should speak to Arvaethor.
Arvaethor asks for you to accompany him into a cavern under the White Mountains and drive the Orkish forces back.
Defeat the Orc chieftain
Dead seep into the room.\n\nYou should stay in the cave and learn of what is happening.
Push the Orkish forces further into the mountain.
Push the Orkish forces further into the mountain.
Defeat the Orc chieftain.
Escape the Dead and return to where you entered the cave.
Stay in the cave and learn of what is happening
Defeated Orcs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Speak to Arvaethor
Push the Orkish forces further into the mountain
Speak with Arvaethor at the head of the cave.
Push the Orkish forces further into the mountain
Arvaethor is out of breath but wishes to speak with you
Use the whistle to summon your new friend if you become separated
You ran out of time!
Arvaethor has fallen in battle!
